alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 9:47AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chicot County, northeastern East Carroll and northeastern West Carroll Parishes, southwestern Washington and northwestern Issaquena Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 946 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gassoway, or 9 miles south of Eudora, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gassoway, Millikin and Shelburn around 1000 AM CDT. Glen Allan around 1025 AM CDT. Grace around 1040 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mayersville and Kilbourne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
